summary: John shared another sneak peek at his X-Men Elsewhen practice pages. 2018. He wrote: At that breakfast meeting in Boston, CB...
caption:
John shared another sneak peek at his X-Men Elsewhen practice pages. 2018.

He wrote:

At that breakfast meeting in Boston, CB told me that if this were to actually happen, Marvel would want the first issue to be “double sized”–38 pages. So, I did that.

Obviously, tho, I won’t be showing any of those pages here*, as this 20 page “preview” is more than enough!!

*Unless this all falls thru. Then I’ll continue the “fanfic” approach.

But…

Here’s a peek at a subplot page that now doesn’t have to wait for the second issue…

The ship, the asteroid base and the hangar deck are traced from models I built in STRATA.

BWS does not mean I am asking for a Barry Windsor Smith effect. It stands for Black With Stars.

body:
Ya’ll know it will happen

So when can I expect the ‘Harry Potter found Venom and bonded with it, how will this change his Hogwarts experience’ stories? Cause I know it will happen at some point. I’m asking for a time frame cause I’m salivating over the idea but have too many stories of my own to try it myself at the moment.

If ya’ll need a head start well….

First Meeting

-Vernon went on a business trip to San Francisco to talk to the Life Foundation and had to bring Harry along for some reason, Harry finds Venom

- Life Foundation moved to Britian to escape scrutiny, Harry somehow comes in contact with Venom

-Eddie is dying too fast for Venom to heal, Harry is near by and takes on the Symbiote so it doesn’t die (if ya wanna go the angsty Venom route)

At Hogwarts

-Venom hears trolls are particularly tasty, luckily one just happens to stroll into school

- Same as above but with a rat animagus 😉

- Same as above but with dragons 😋

- Venom constantly asking to eat Snape/Quirrel/Lockhart/Umbridge

- Venom loving house elves because they feed him as much chocolate and tater tots as he wants

If Dumbledore is an asshole

- Venom constantly asking to eat him and eventually getting to once they get their revenge

If Voldemort is the true villian

- Venom being absolutely delighted that he has blanket permission to eat Voldemort and any of his Death Eaters

Gold Star Concept

-Harry having a constant, loyal companion who protects and loves him and is not using him for money or fame and isn’t jealous of attention he clearly hates

Title ideas:

Harry Potter and the Alien Danger Noodle

Why Venom having a Magical host is a bad idea

Hogwarts: School of Tasty Treats

I look forward to the future craziness!!!

title: Cool Kids 15
body:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader!Castle

Warning: Violence. Wish of dying. Mentions of assault. Fighting. Violent past. Stabbing. Hostile anger. Dislike for being touched. Mentions of death. Breaking laws. Revenge/Payback. Defiance in school.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

In Crew you take an oath. You live by it everyday. In this world it’s the only religion there is. And they only have two rules.
No Couples.
Don’t Fall In Love.
Being one of the only girls in Crew is walking a thin line.
One Side. Nobody dares fuck with you.
The Other. Crew guys don’t like being threatened by a girl.
But the boys you run with, they’re your family. The only ones, but your older brother Frank. Who started a Crew in your little town and runs the largest one to the day. You protect them, they stomp anyone who touches you without permission.
You and Steve are synced. Words don’t need to be exchanged to know what the other is thinking. When he moves, you move. When you need escape, he’s the sanctuary.
The dangerous part about being in a Crew. Don’t Fall In Love, and you’re so fucked. You’re hopelessly in love. But will your secrets let you accept it? Will you ever admit to why you’re this way? Why Steve Rogers is the only person you allow to touch you?

Tag List Is Open!!

You lug your bag up your shoulder as you jog up the stairs towards your locker. You were slightly annoyed already this morning, you’d woken twice from nightmares the night before. You thought about going to Steve’s, but that tingle settled in the pit of your stomach and you decided against it. You didn’t understand that tingle, it was foreign and frightening to you.

“Y/N.” You look up Bec’s was jogging towards you. “Hey, I need your help.” She smiles as she falls into step with you.

“Help?” You settle her with a look, the two of you coming to a stop at your lockers.

“Well more, like a favor.” She shrugs, admitting the real reason she was bugging you. You sigh pulling open your locker.

“What do you want Bec’s?” You ask shoving books into your locker. She sucks in a breath, turning to face you.

“The Bunnies always do a charity thing, well this year I came up with the charity.” She nods.

“I’m not a Bunny.” You cock your brow at her as you shove your next class books and notebooks in your bag.

“No, you’re not.” She nods, chewing her bottom lip. “You’re Crew royalty.” She admits, you shove your locker shut, turning to face her. “We have to go around to the businesses in town and get donations. Most places are Crew tied. I need you.” She gives you wide, pleading, blue eyes.

“Potts runs that shit and I do best staying far away from her.” You shake your head, starting down the hall, Bec’s hurries after you.

“But Y/N, please?” She begs catching up. “Mary and Wanda think I’m a joke, they think I’ll fail, and they can mock me without getting beat down by you or Nat.” She admits. You squint at her, your jaw clenches, that fucking truce was starting to really get under your skin.

“Really Bec’s, it’s probably best I don’t help you.” You sigh, running a hand through your pink hair that fell over your shoulder. Bec’s heaves a heavy sigh.

“You’d take a bullet for my brothers, just not me.” Her voice bitter as you come to a stop outside your class.

“They’re Crew, that’s not a favor. I did my favor for you Rebecca, you’ll do right to remember it too.” You hiss, glaring at her. “I called a truce with those skank ass, evil little fucking Bunnies for you. Now you need me again, because of them.” You shake your head. “Your favor quota is done for this month.” You point at her, her eyes wide.

Surprised by your reaction, her mouth was ajar, people were watching as they moved on to their classes. You shake your head, before you turn storming into your class, leaving her standing there. You drop into your seat, glancing up just in time to catch Bec’s bursting into a sob before she took off at a run down the hall.

“Fuck.” You groan, dropping your head onto your desk.



You sat in study hall, your hands in your hair, elbows on the table, your notes sprawled out in front of you. Nothing was sticking, your mind kept flashing back to Bec’s crying. You really were a fucking dick sometimes. This was why you didn’t have female friends, you didn’t handle well when they cried, or when they needed things. The flashback of Bec’s crying, tugs at you, flashing you back to finding her dirty and shaking after Grant attacked her, the way she clung to you.

“Mother Fucker.” You grumble. You always protected Bec’s, it was second nature, just like protecting the guys. So why the fuck did you get so pissed off about helping her? These nightmares were really starting to fucking ruin everything. Again.

“Mr. Rogers. What are you doing in here?” Ms. Perry asks looking up from her laptop.

“The office said to give you this.” He flashes that crooked grin at her. You can see her blush behind her massive glasses, as she takes the slip of paper. He used that smile to avoid getting into trouble with the female staff in the school, you hated how effective it was.

“Take a seat then.” She smiles. Steve smiles back before he heads for your table. He drops his bag next to his chair before dropping into it.

“What are you doing here?” You whisper across the table at him. He leans forward, propping his chin in his hand. His blonde hair held back with his backwards ball cap, his royal blue T-shirt hugged his shoulders and made his blue eyes even brighter.

“Transferring classes.” He nods, something flickers in his blue eyes, irritation.

“Why?” You drop one hand from your hair, resting on the one still wrapped in your hair.

“Parker’s mouthing off, I told them to transfer me or I was going to smash his face into a desk.” His eyes flick around the room. “I didn’t know he was in here.” His jaw ticks, his eyes landed on Ben. As if he knew the two of you were talking about him, he glances over. They lock eyes for a moment before he grabs his things, coming over to your table.

“Talking about me?” Ben asks, dropping into the seat.

“Yeah, I am.” Steve retorts, his voice was low, edged and a warning. Steve was worked up, he was holding on for the sake of class.

“Gotta problem?” Ben leans in slightly. Your eyes flick to Steve who drops his hand and leans in as well.

“Steve.” Your voice soft, a warning. Too many people were in the room, too many people were listening.

“Your cousin keeps mouthing off and there will be a Crew war. You ready for that?” Steve glares at Ben. You weren’t ready for that.

“I thought he was behaving?” Ben sighs, rubbing a hand over his face.

“Not close. He’s mouthing off about having the biggest and baddest Crew. He’s gunning for Crew war.” Steve’s jaw ticks.

“What are you thinking? He’s not fit?” You shift in your seat, watching Steve. His eyes leave Ben, falling on you, that tingle settles in your belly, spreading. “You think we should talk to Peter?” Your voice came out ragged suddenly. You weren’t sure if it was the fear of talking to Peter or whatever the hell that tingle is.

“What about?” Ben looks between the two of you, watching each other.

“You know Buck will put this on you. You have to be willing to talk to him. It’s Crew business, he won’t talk to Ben.” Steve shrugs, his voice was softer talking to you. He knew this was going to be the only course of action, if Kaine kept mouthing off, you’d have to reach out, even if you didn’t want too.

“I’ll do what I have too.” You nod. You really didn’t want to, you knew if it came down to it Steve would go with you. But you really didn’t want to have to drag Steve into it when you knew Peter had a problem with him and vice versa.

The two of them slip into their studying, your mind wanders, chewing your bottom lip. Your eyes scan the room, the Bunnies sat at one table, you saw Sunday toss her ponytail over her shoulder, snickering about something. Your chest pangs for Bec’s, you were probably going to end up in jail, but you knew you were going to help her.

“You okay?” Steve watches you with curious blue eyes. This pulls Ben’s attention too, they’re both watching you. You pull your hair over your shoulder, working it between your fingers, a nervous twitch. That was the thing about Steve, when he asked he actually wanted to know. He wasn’t asking so he could mock you about it.

“I think,” you glance down at your fingers wrapped in pale pink hair “I’m going to help Bec’s.” you admit softly. Steve leans in closer, shock on his face when you glance up.

“With Potts charity bullshit?” He asks, his brow connects.

“My dad could donate.” Ben shrugs, you and Steve look over at him.

“What?” You blink.

“He owns a chain of car dealerships. Tell me the amount, I’ll call him.” Ben nods.

“How do you know about it, the charity?” You squint.

“Another Bunny already asked me. I assume Kaine told them about my dad. That’s why we’re here, expanding business and the underground fight ring.” Ben shrugs a shoulder.

“Are you, your help,” you babble, blinking at him “being around, is that so you can get close to my brothers?” You ask, Steve’s jaw snaps closed.

“What?” Ben’s brow snaps together.

“Frank Castle, Luke Cage. They’re top fighters in the ring, here.” Your throat starts to close.

“I know. I know.” Ben nods. “But no, no, not at all.” He shakes his head. “I just want to help. Besides when Bec’s asked a Crew girl for help, word spread fast. They sit behind me in Lit, they think she’s a joke.” He shrugs, your head tips. “I just want to help.” He nods, looking down at his notes.

Something about why he wanted to help. Who he wanted to help, it was clicking things into place for you. Steve squints at Ben, he hadn’t caught on, thank god or Ben would be on the floor. Ben wasn’t hanging around to get into your pants, he was around for Bec’s. Hell would rain down the moment Steve and Buck found out, and you weren’t sure which would be worse, Crew War and the beat down Ben will get for skirting around with Bec’s.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

In Crew you take an oath. You live by it everyday. In this world it’s the only religion there is. And they only have two rules.
No Couples.
Don’t Fall In Love.
Being one of the only girls in Crew is walking a thin line.
One Side. Nobody dares fuck with you.
The Other. Crew guys don’t like being threatened by a girl.
But the boys you run with, they’re your family. The only ones, but your older brother Frank. Who started a Crew in your little town and runs the largest one to the day. You protect them, they stomp anyone who touches you without permission.
You and Steve are synced. Words don’t need to be exchanged to know what the other is thinking. When he moves, you move. When you need escape, he’s the sanctuary.
The dangerous part about being in a Crew. Don’t Fall In Love, and you’re so fucked. You’re hopelessly in love. But will your secrets let you accept it? Will you ever admit to why you’re this way? Why Steve Rogers is the only person you allow to touch you?

Tag List Is Open!!

[[MORE]]

You lug your bag up your shoulder as you jog up the stairs towards your locker. You were slightly annoyed already this morning, you’d woken twice from nightmares the night before. You thought about going to Steve’s, but that tingle settled in the pit of your stomach and you decided against it. You didn’t understand that tingle, it was foreign and frightening to you.

“Y/N.” You look up Bec’s was jogging towards you. “Hey, I need your help.” She smiles as she falls into step with you.

“Help?” You settle her with a look, the two of you coming to a stop at your lockers.

“Well more, like a favor.” She shrugs, admitting the real reason she was bugging you. You sigh pulling open your locker.

“What do you want Bec’s?” You ask shoving books into your locker. She sucks in a breath, turning to face you.

“The Bunnies always do a charity thing, well this year I came up with the charity.” She nods.

“I’m not a Bunny.” You cock your brow at her as you shove your next class books and notebooks in your bag.

“No, you’re not.” She nods, chewing her bottom lip. “You’re Crew royalty.” She admits, you shove your locker shut, turning to face her. “We have to go around to the businesses in town and get donations. Most places are Crew tied. I need you.” She gives you wide, pleading, blue eyes.

“Potts runs that shit and I do best staying far away from her.” You shake your head, starting down the hall, Bec’s hurries after you.

“But Y/N, please?” She begs catching up. “Mary and Wanda think I’m a joke, they think I’ll fail, and they can mock me without getting beat down by you or Nat.” She admits. You squint at her, your jaw clenches, that fucking truce was starting to really get under your skin.

“Really Bec’s, it’s probably best I don’t help you.” You sigh, running a hand through your pink hair that fell over your shoulder. Bec’s heaves a heavy sigh.

“You’d take a bullet for my brothers, just not me.” Her voice bitter as you come to a stop outside your class.

“They’re Crew, that’s not a favor. I did my favor for you Rebecca, you’ll do right to remember it too.” You hiss, glaring at her. “I called a truce with those skank ass, evil little fucking Bunnies for you. Now you need me again, because of them.” You shake your head. “Your favor quota is done for this month.” You point at her, her eyes wide.

Surprised by your reaction, her mouth was ajar, people were watching as they moved on to their classes. You shake your head, before you turn storming into your class, leaving her standing there. You drop into your seat, glancing up just in time to catch Bec’s bursting into a sob before she took off at a run down the hall.

“Fuck.” You groan, dropping your head onto your desk.



You sat in study hall, your hands in your hair, elbows on the table, your notes sprawled out in front of you. Nothing was sticking, your mind kept flashing back to Bec’s crying. You really were a fucking dick sometimes. This was why you didn’t have female friends, you didn’t handle well when they cried, or when they needed things. The flashback of Bec’s crying, tugs at you, flashing you back to finding her dirty and shaking after Grant attacked her, the way she clung to you.

“Mother Fucker.” You grumble. You always protected Bec’s, it was second nature, just like protecting the guys. So why the fuck did you get so pissed off about helping her? These nightmares were really starting to fucking ruin everything. Again.

“Mr. Rogers. What are you doing in here?” Ms. Perry asks looking up from her laptop.

“The office said to give you this.” He flashes that crooked grin at her. You can see her blush behind her massive glasses, as she takes the slip of paper. He used that smile to avoid getting into trouble with the female staff in the school, you hated how effective it was.

“Take a seat then.” She smiles. Steve smiles back before he heads for your table. He drops his bag next to his chair before dropping into it.

“What are you doing here?” You whisper across the table at him. He leans forward, propping his chin in his hand. His blonde hair held back with his backwards ball cap, his royal blue T-shirt hugged his shoulders and made his blue eyes even brighter.

“Transferring classes.” He nods, something flickers in his blue eyes, irritation.

“Why?” You drop one hand from your hair, resting on the one still wrapped in your hair.

“Parker’s mouthing off, I told them to transfer me or I was going to smash his face into a desk.” His eyes flick around the room. “I didn’t know he was in here.” His jaw ticks, his eyes landed on Ben. As if he knew the two of you were talking about him, he glances over. They lock eyes for a moment before he grabs his things, coming over to your table.

“Talking about me?” Ben asks, dropping into the seat.

“Yeah, I am.” Steve retorts, his voice was low, edged and a warning. Steve was worked up, he was holding on for the sake of class.

“Gotta problem?” Ben leans in slightly. Your eyes flick to Steve who drops his hand and leans in as well.

“Steve.” Your voice soft, a warning. Too many people were in the room, too many people were listening.

“Your cousin keeps mouthing off and there will be a Crew war. You ready for that?” Steve glares at Ben. You weren’t ready for that.

“I thought he was behaving?” Ben sighs, rubbing a hand over his face.

“Not close. He’s mouthing off about having the biggest and baddest Crew. He’s gunning for Crew war.” Steve’s jaw ticks.

“What are you thinking? He’s not fit?” You shift in your seat, watching Steve. His eyes leave Ben, falling on you, that tingle settles in your belly, spreading. “You think we should talk to Peter?” Your voice came out ragged suddenly. You weren’t sure if it was the fear of talking to Peter or whatever the hell that tingle is.

“What about?” Ben looks between the two of you, watching each other.

“You know Buck will put this on you. You have to be willing to talk to him. It’s Crew business, he won’t talk to Ben.” Steve shrugs, his voice was softer talking to you. He knew this was going to be the only course of action, if Kaine kept mouthing off, you’d have to reach out, even if you didn’t want too.

“I’ll do what I have too.” You nod. You really didn’t want to, you knew if it came down to it Steve would go with you. But you really didn’t want to have to drag Steve into it when you knew Peter had a problem with him and vice versa.

The two of them slip into their studying, your mind wanders, chewing your bottom lip. Your eyes scan the room, the Bunnies sat at one table, you saw Sunday toss her ponytail over her shoulder, snickering about something. Your chest pangs for Bec’s, you were probably going to end up in jail, but you knew you were going to help her.

“You okay?” Steve watches you with curious blue eyes. This pulls Ben’s attention too, they’re both watching you. You pull your hair over your shoulder, working it between your fingers, a nervous twitch. That was the thing about Steve, when he asked he actually wanted to know. He wasn’t asking so he could mock you about it.

“I think,” you glance down at your fingers wrapped in pale pink hair “I’m going to help Bec’s.” you admit softly. Steve leans in closer, shock on his face when you glance up.

“With Potts charity bullshit?” He asks, his brow connects.

“My dad could donate.” Ben shrugs, you and Steve look over at him.

“What?” You blink.

“He owns a chain of car dealerships. Tell me the amount, I’ll call him.” Ben nods.

“How do you know about it, the charity?” You squint.

“Another Bunny already asked me. I assume Kaine told them about my dad. That’s why we’re here, expanding business and the underground fight ring.” Ben shrugs a shoulder.

“Are you, your help,” you babble, blinking at him “being around, is that so you can get close to my brothers?” You ask, Steve’s jaw snaps closed.

“What?” Ben’s brow snaps together.

“Frank Castle, Luke Cage. They’re top fighters in the ring, here.” Your throat starts to close.

“I know. I know.” Ben nods. “But no, no, not at all.” He shakes his head. “I just want to help. Besides when Bec’s asked a Crew girl for help, word spread fast. They sit behind me in Lit, they think she’s a joke.” He shrugs, your head tips. “I just want to help.” He nods, looking down at his notes.

Something about why he wanted to help. Who he wanted to help, it was clicking things into place for you. Steve squints at Ben, he hadn’t caught on, thank god or Ben would be on the floor. Ben wasn’t hanging around to get into your pants, he was around for Bec’s. Hell would rain down the moment Steve and Buck found out, and you weren’t sure which would be worse, Crew War and the beat down Ben will get for skirting around with Bec’s.

“The office said to give you this.” He flashes that crooked grin at her. You can see her blush behind her massive glasses, as she takes the slip of paper. He used that smile to avoid getting into trouble with the female staff in the school, you hated how effective it was.

“Take a seat then.” She smiles. Steve smiles back before he heads for your table. He drops his bag next to his chair before dropping into it.

“What are you doing here?” You whisper across the table at him. He leans forward, propping his chin in his hand. His blonde hair held back with his backwards ball cap, his royal blue T-shirt hugged his shoulders and made his blue eyes even brighter.

“Transferring classes.” He nods, something flickers in his blue eyes, irritation.

“Why?” You drop one hand from your hair, resting on the one still wrapped in your hair.

“Parker’s mouthing off, I told them to transfer me or I was going to smash his face into a desk.” His eyes flick around the room. “I didn’t know he was in here.” His jaw ticks, his eyes landed on Ben. As if he knew the two of you were talking about him, he glances over. They lock eyes for a moment before he grabs his things, coming over to your table.

“Talking about me?” Ben asks, dropping into the seat.

“Yeah, I am.” Steve retorts, his voice was low, edged and a warning. Steve was worked up, he was holding on for the sake of class.

“Gotta problem?” Ben leans in slightly. Your eyes flick to Steve who drops his hand and leans in as well.

“Steve.” Your voice soft, a warning. Too many people were in the room, too many people were listening.

“Your cousin keeps mouthing off and there will be a Crew war. You ready for that?” Steve glares at Ben. You weren’t ready for that.

“I thought he was behaving?” Ben sighs, rubbing a hand over his face.

“Not close. He’s mouthing off about having the biggest and baddest Crew. He’s gunning for Crew war.” Steve’s jaw ticks.

“What are you thinking? He’s not fit?” You shift in your seat, watching Steve. His eyes leave Ben, falling on you, that tingle settles in your belly, spreading. “You think we should talk to Peter?” Your voice came out ragged suddenly. You weren’t sure if it was the fear of talking to Peter or whatever the hell that tingle is.

“What about?” Ben looks between the two of you, watching each other.

“You know Buck will put this on you. You have to be willing to talk to him. It’s Crew business, he won’t talk to Ben.” Steve shrugs, his voice was softer talking to you. He knew this was going to be the only course of action, if Kaine kept mouthing off, you’d have to reach out, even if you didn’t want too.

“I’ll do what I have too.” You nod. You really didn’t want to, you knew if it came down to it Steve would go with you. But you really didn’t want to have to drag Steve into it when you knew Peter had a problem with him and vice versa.

The two of them slip into their studying, your mind wanders, chewing your bottom lip. Your eyes scan the room, the Bunnies sat at one table, you saw Sunday toss her ponytail over her shoulder, snickering about something. Your chest pangs for Bec’s, you were probably going to end up in jail, but you knew you were going to help her.

“You okay?” Steve watches you with curious blue eyes. This pulls Ben’s attention too, they’re both watching you. You pull your hair over your shoulder, working it between your fingers, a nervous twitch. That was the thing about Steve, when he asked he actually wanted to know. He wasn’t asking so he could mock you about it.

“I think,” you glance down at your fingers wrapped in pale pink hair “I’m going to help Bec’s.” you admit softly. Steve leans in closer, shock on his face when you glance up.

“With Potts charity bullshit?” He asks, his brow connects.

“My dad could donate.” Ben shrugs, you and Steve look over at him.

“What?” You blink.

“He owns a chain of car dealerships. Tell me the amount, I’ll call him.” Ben nods.

“How do you know about it, the charity?” You squint.

“Another Bunny already asked me. I assume Kaine told them about my dad. That’s why we’re here, expanding business and the underground fight ring.” Ben shrugs a shoulder.

“Are you, your help,” you babble, blinking at him “being around, is that so you can get close to my brothers?” You ask, Steve’s jaw snaps closed.

“What?” Ben’s brow snaps together.

“Frank Castle, Luke Cage. They’re top fighters in the ring, here.” Your throat starts to close.

“I know. I know.” Ben nods. “But no, no, not at all.” He shakes his head. “I just want to help. Besides when Bec’s asked a Crew girl for help, word spread fast. They sit behind me in Lit, they think she’s a joke.” He shrugs, your head tips. “I just want to help.” He nods, looking down at his notes.

Something about why he wanted to help. Who he wanted to help, it was clicking things into place for you. Steve squints at Ben, he hadn’t caught on, thank god or Ben would be on the floor. Ben wasn’t hanging around to get into your pants, he was around for Bec’s. Hell would rain down the moment Steve and Buck found out, and you weren’t sure which would be worse, Crew War and the beat down Ben will get for skirting around with Bec’s.

trail.content_abstract:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader!Castle

Warning: Violence. Wish of dying. Mentions of assault. Fighting. Violent past. Stabbing. Hostile anger. Dislike for being touched. Mentions of death. Breaking laws. Revenge/Payback. Defiance in school.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

In Crew you take an oath. You live by it everyday. In this world it’s the only religion there is. And they only have two rules.
No Couples.
Don’t Fall In Love.
Being one of the only girls in Crew is walking a thin line.
One Side. Nobody dares fuck with you.
The Other. Crew guys don’t like being threatened by a girl.
But the boys you run with, they’re your family. The only ones, but your older brother Frank. Who started a Crew in your little town and runs the largest one to the day. You protect them, they stomp anyone who touches you without permission.
You and Steve are synced. Words don’t need to be exchanged to know what the other is thinking. When he moves, you move. When you need escape, he’s the sanctuary.
The dangerous part about being in a Crew. Don’t Fall In Love, and you’re so fucked. You’re hopelessly in love. But will your secrets let you accept it? Will you ever admit to why you’re this way? Why Steve Rogers is the only person you allow to touch you?
